akn:content.akn:p:
§ 1012a. Funding In addition to any other funds made available by this chapter, of the funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation, the Secretary shall make available to carry out this chapter $150,000,000 for fiscal year 2026 and each fiscal year thereafter, to remain available until expended. (Aug. 4, 1954, ch. 656, § 15, as added Pub. L. 115–334, title II, § 2401(c), Dec. 20, 2018, 132 Stat. 4570; amended Pub. L. 119–21, title I, § 10601(e), July 4, 2025, 139 Stat. 108.)
Editorial Notes Amendments2025—Pub. L. 119–21 substituted “$150,000,000 for fiscal year 2026 and each fiscal year thereafter, to remain available until expended” for “$50,000,000 for fiscal year 2019 and each fiscal year thereafter”.
